pp1.2:2.1: Kodhano ca, upanāhī ca. 1
pp1.2:3.1: Makkhī ca, paḷāsī ca. 2
pp1.2:4.1: Issukī ca, maccharī ca. 3
pp1.2:5.1: Saṭho ca, māyāvī ca. 4
pp1.2:6.1: Ahiriko ca, anottappī ca. 5
pp1.2:7.1: Dubbaco ca, pāpamitto ca. 6
pp1.2:8.1: Indriyesu aguttadvāro ca, bhojane amattaññū ca. 7
pp1.2:9.1: Muṭṭhassati ca, asampajāno ca. 8
pp1.2:10.1: Sīlavipanno ca, diṭṭhivipanno ca. 9
pp1.2:11.1: Ajjhattasaṁyojano ca, bahiddhāsaṁyojano ca. 10
pp1.2:12.1: Akkodhano ca, anupanāhī ca. 11
pp1.2:13.1: Amakkhī ca, apaḷāsī ca. 12
pp1.2:14.1: Anissukī ca, amaccharī ca. 13
pp1.2:15.1: Asaṭho ca, amāyāvī ca. 14
pp1.2:16.1: Hirimā ca, ottappī ca. 15
pp1.2:17.1: Suvaco ca, kalyāṇamitto ca. 16
pp1.2:18.1: Indriyesu guttadvāro ca, bhojane mattaññū ca. 17
pp1.2:19.1: Upaṭṭhitassati ca, sampajāno ca. 18
pp1.2:20.1: Sīlasampanno ca, diṭṭhisampanno ca. 19
pp1.2:21.1: Dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṁ. 20
pp1.2:24.1: Dvinnaṁ puggalānaṁ āsavā vaḍḍhanti. 23
pp1.2:25.1: Dvinnaṁ puggalānaṁ āsavā na vaḍḍhanti. 24
pp1.2:26.1: Hīnādhimutto ca, paṇītādhimutto ca. 25
pp1.2:27.1: Titto ca, tappetā ca. 26
